# wantsHDREnvironmentTextures

**Instance Property**

A flag that instructs ARKit to create environment textures in HDR format.

## Declaration

```swift
var wantsHDREnvironmentTextures: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. If your renderer supports HDR environment textures, this feature effects more realistic reflections.



RealityKit and SceneKit both support HDR environment textures. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/adding-realistic-reflections-to-an-ar-experience].

## Adding Realistic Reflections

- **environmentTexturing**: The behavior ARKit uses for generating environment textures.
